name: LITR
description: LITRBULL is a GameFi ecosystem on Telegram that merges gaming, NFTs, DeFi, and artificial intelligence. Players click to earn milk, upgrade superhero bulls, and earn $LITR through battles and quests. NFT items empower characters, while the DAO governs project evolution. The in-game quest marketplace helps other projects grow through community engagement. With AI-powered missions, adaptive enemies, and smart strategy support, LITRBULL delivers a next-gen experience. The project is already live, supports Web3, staking, trading, and decentralized governance.
